The African Academy of Languages (ACALAN; French: Académie Africaine des Langues; Portuguese: Academia Africana de Línguas or ACALIN) bụ òtù nzukọ Pan-African nke onye isi ala Mali n'oge ahụ bụ Alpha Oumar Konaré tọrọ ntọala na 2001 maka mbunyi na kwazi nkwalite asụsụ Africa
Na mbu e guzobere ya dị ka Mission for the African Academy of Languages (MACALAN)
Onye mbụ bu onye isi nke ACALAN bụ onye bụbu minista nke agụmakwụkwọ bụ isi nke Mali bụ Adama Samassekou
African Union kwupụtara na afọ 2006   bu afọ Asụsụ Africa ma guzobe African Academy of Languages, June 21 hụrụ mwepụta nke Board Governing nke ACALAN na Addis Ababa, Ethiopia.

Kemgbe e kere ACALAN etinyela aka n'ọtụtụ ọrụ n'ofe Afrịka site na mmepe nke atlas nke asụsụ Africa ruo n'ịhazi na nhazi nke usoro ederede nke asụsụ ụgbọ ala gafere dị ka Fulfulde, Hausa na Mandenkan..
Site na Disemba 2009 ruo August 2015, Prọfesọ Sozinho Francisco Matsinhe nke Mozambique duziri ACALAN.
Lang Fafa Dampha nọchiri ya n'ihe nkiri ma malite na Jenụwarị 2019 na aha zuru ezu.
E kewara ACALAN n'ime akụkụ isi ise na ọkwa mba dị iche iche, ha bụ:
ACALAN dịkwa na ụlọ ọrụ National Language Structures (NLS) na steeti ọ bụla yana otu Asụsụ Vehicular Cross-Border maka asụsụ ya ọ bụla..
